#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int func(int *a,int *b,int n)
{
int beg=0,ans=0;
vector<pair<int,int> >v;
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
v.push_back(make_pair(b[i],a[i]));
sort(v.begin(),v.end());
for(int i=0;i<v.size();i++)
{
if(beg<=v[i].second)
{
beg=v[i].first;
ans++;
}
}
return ans;
}
int main()
{
ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
int n;
cin>>n;
int a[n],b[n];
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
cin>>a[i];
for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
cin>>b[j];
cout<<func(a,b,n)<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
